name: Belly Dancing with Mirage Fusion Belly Dance

shows.title: Belly Dancing
shows.desc:
Join ‘Mirage’ to learn some basic belly dance moves and then put them into a choreography. A light hearted and fun workshop, open to anyone who would like to give it a try. No previous dance experience needed.

Carol (Mirage) teaches belly dance to everyday people to give them confidence and improve their self esteem.

shows.title: Belly Dancing
shows.desc:
Join ‘Mirage’ to learn some belly dance moves in this fun workshop. You can borrow a real belly dance coin belt so you look the part too! Children must be accompanied by an adult.

Carol (Mirage) teaches belly dance to everyday people to give them confidence and improve their self esteem.
